card_name: Kai'Long, the Call of the Dark
rules_text:
Flying
You may cast black spells with mana value 3 or less by paying life equal to their mana values rather than paying their mana costs.
{B}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 3 life.
notes: !rul This is an alternate cost, and cannot be combined with any other alterrnate costs. Additional costs may still be paid, and will be paid normally.
